publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

availability.licence: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

supportDesc.foliation: There is foliation provided in the lower right corner of each folio.

collation.note: The quire structure with this manuscript is not discernible due to the tightness of the binding and the quality of the images.

layout.ab: Primary pricks are visible, horizontal pricks are visible.
The upper line is written above the ruling, the lower line is written above the ruling.

handNote.seg: The name (and other holy names), the first two lines of the explicit of the narrations and stanzas, and all the legends of the miniatures are rubricated.

decoDesc.summary: The manuscript is richly decorated with multiple miniatures mainly belong to the so called First Gondarine style of decoration. Paintings in the manuscript appear after their corresponding narrations as means of illustration for the texts.

decoNote.desc: A miniature with two episodes, showing: first and feeling sad for not having a kid, and second, an announcing them that their prayer is received by God and telling them they will get a doughtier soon.
A miniature of the art theme with two episodes, showing: first and , the later carrying child, both going to the temple, and second, the child being blessed by two priests in the temple.

A miniature of the art theme with two episodes showing: first, the , named , in the act of old man informing the Virgin , who is portrayed in the act of spinning that she will become the mother of Jesus
A miniature showing saluting and surrounded by other relatives.

A miniature of the art theme with episodes, showing: first sitting near to the child who is lied on a garment manger, and second, a cow and donkey breathing on the child giving Him heat where , and other three angels surrounded in the depiction.
A miniature of the art theme with one episode showing the infanticide ordered by , sitting on a throne and his solders slaughtering the kids.
A miniature of the art theme with one episode showing, who is carrying her child mounted on donkey and and standing before and after them respectively.

A miniature of the art theme with two episodes, showing: first, Satan in the act of an elderly man appearing to and tried to tempt him, and second, Satan with his real demonized image flying far from who is performing a gesture of blessing.

A miniature of the art theme A miniature with two episodes, showing: first, standing and praying near to the river Jordan ,and second, baptizing in the river Jordan. The in the form of dove descending from above.

A miniature with two episodes,showing: first, Saint who is st reaching her two hands praying at Golgotha over a tomb which is surrounded by keepers,and second depicts the apparition of Our Lord to Mary.
A miniature with one episode showing a group of angels and prophets surrounding bowing for the glorification of the Virgin Saint who is standing with her hands crossed on her chest.
A miniature with one episode showing providing hopes to his mother who is sitting near to the him and Angeles, saints, prophets and David (playing his Baganā) surrounded in the depiction.
A miniature with one episode where our Lord showing a hell to and the depiction is surrounded by angels.
A miniature showing Saint in Qarānǝyo with two episodes: first grieving about sinners and second who is standing with stretched hands praying about the sinners.
A miniature of the art theme with one episode where Our Lord and His mother Saint standing in the center of the scene and surrounded by Angeles.
A miniature of the art theme with one episode where the Virgin depicted asleep in the center of the scene and surrounded by apostles with some handling lights.
A miniature of the art theme with one episode where standing with her hands crossed on her chest is surrounded by angels surrounding on clouds.

A miniature with one episode showing a group of people with traditional Ethiopian musical instruments surrounding and playing music for the glorification of the Virgin Saint who is sitting in the center of the depiction.
The Iconography of the art theme showing the icon and the angles and depicted left and right respectively.
A miniature with one episode, showing the Lord depicted with His mother and teaching the twelve who are surrounded the scene.

binding.decoNote: Blind-tooled leather cover, with textile inlays
